verses.verse: And Jacob<WH3290> dwelt<WH3427> in the land<WH776> wherein his father<WH1> was a stranger,<WH4033> in the land<WH776> of Canaan.<WH3667>

These <WH428> are the generations<WH8435> of Jacob.<WH3290> Joseph,<WH3130> being seventeen<WH7651> <WH6240> years<WH8141> old,<WH1121> was<WH1961> feeding<WH7462> the flock<WH6629> with<WH854> his brethren;<WH251> and the lad<WH5288> was with<WH854> the sons<WH1121> of Bilhah,<WH1090> and with<WH854> the sons<WH1121> of Zilpah,<WH2153> his father's<WH1> wives:<WH802> and Joseph<WH3130> brought<WH935> unto<WH413> his father<WH1> their<WH853> evil<WH7451> report.<WH1681>

Now Israel<WH3478> loved<WH157> <WH853> Joseph<WH3130> more than all<WH4480> <WH3605> his children,<WH1121> because<WH3588> he<WH1931> was the son<WH1121> of his old age:<WH2208> and he made<WH6213> him a coat<WH3801> of many colors.<WH6446>

And when his brethren<WH251> saw<WH7200> that<WH3588> their father<WH1> loved<WH157> him more than all<WH4480> <WH3605> his brethren,<WH251> they hated<WH8130> him, and could<WH3201> not<WH3808> speak<WH1696> peaceably<WH7965> unto him.
And Joseph<WH3130> dreamed<WH2492> a dream,<WH2472> and he told<WH5046> it his brethren:<WH251> and they hated<WH8130> him yet<WH5750> the more.<WH3254>
And he said<WH559> unto<WH413> them, Hear,<WH8085> I pray you,<WH4994> this<WH2088> dream<WH2472> which<WH834> I have dreamed: <WH2492>

For, behold,<WH2009> we<WH587> were binding<WH481> sheaves<WH485> in<WH8432> the field,<WH7704> and, lo,<WH2009> my sheaf<WH485> arose,<WH6965> and also<WH1571> stood upright;<WH5324> and, behold,<WH2009> your sheaves<WH485> stood round about,<WH5437> and made obeisance<WH7812> to my sheaf.<WH485>

And his brethren<WH251> said<WH559> to him, Shalt thou indeed reign<WH4427> <WH4427> over<WH5921> us? or<WH518> shalt thou indeed have dominion<WH4910> <WH4910> over us? And they hated<WH8130> him yet<WH5750> the more<WH3254> for<WH5921> his dreams,<WH2472> and for<WH5921> his words.<WH1697>

And he dreamed<WH2492> yet<WH5750> another<WH312> dream,<WH2472> and told<WH5608> it his brethren,<WH251> and said,<WH559> Behold,<WH2009> I have dreamed<WH2492> a dream<WH2472> more;<WH5750> and, behold,<WH2009> the sun<WH8121> and the moon<WH3394> and the eleven<WH259> <WH6240> stars<WH3556> made obeisance<WH7812> to me.

And he told<WH5608> it to<WH413> his father,<WH1> and to<WH413> his brethren:<WH251> and his father<WH1> rebuked<WH1605> him, and said<WH559> unto him, What<WH4100> is this<WH2088> dream<WH2472> that<WH834> thou hast dreamed?<WH2492> Shall I<WH589> and thy mother<WH517> and thy brethren<WH251> indeed come<WH935> <WH935> to bow down ourselves<WH7812> to thee to the earth?<WH776>
And his brethren<WH251> envied<WH7065> him; but his father<WH1> observed<WH8104> <WH853> the saying.<WH1697>
And his brethren<WH251> went<WH1980> to feed<WH7462> <WH853> their father's<WH1> flock<WH6629> in Shechem.<WH7927>

And Israel<WH3478> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Joseph,<WH3130> Do not<WH3808> thy brethren<WH251> feed<WH7462> the flock in Shechem?<WH7927> come,<WH1980> and I will send<WH7971> thee unto<WH413> them. And he said<WH559> to him, Here<WH2009> am I.

And he said<WH559> to him, Go,<WH1980> I pray thee,<WH4994> see<WH7200> whether<WH853> it be well<WH7965> with thy brethren,<WH251> and well<WH7965> with the flocks;<WH6629> and bring<WH7725> me word<WH1697> again. So he sent<WH7971> him out of the vale<WH4480> <WH6010> of Hebron,<WH2275> and he came<WH935> to Shechem.<WH7927>
And a certain man<WH376> found<WH4672> him, and, behold,<WH2009> he was wandering<WH8582> in the field:<WH7704> and the man<WH376> asked<WH7592> him, saying,<WH559> What<WH4100> seekest<WH1245> thou?
And he said,<WH559> I<WH595> seek<WH1245> <WH853> my brethren:<WH251> tell<WH5046> me, I pray thee,<WH4994> where<WH375> they<WH1992> feed<WH7462> their flocks.

And the man<WH376> said,<WH559> They are departed<WH5265> hence;<WH4480> <WH2088> for<WH3588> I heard<WH8085> them say,<WH559> Let us go<WH1980> to Dothan.<WH1886> And Joseph<WH3130> went<WH1980> after<WH310> his brethren,<WH251> and found<WH4672> them in Dothan.<WH1886>
And when they saw<WH7200> him afar off,<WH4480> <WH7350> even before<WH2962> he came near<WH7126> unto<WH413> them, they conspired<WH5230> against him to slay<WH4191> him.
And they said<WH559> one<WH376> to<WH413> another,<WH251> Behold,<WH2009> this<WH1976> dreamer<WH1167> <WH2472> cometh.<WH935>

Come <WH1980> now<WH6258> therefore, and let us slay<WH2026> him, and cast<WH7993> him into some<WH259> pit,<WH953> and we will say,<WH559> Some evil<WH7451> beast<WH2416> hath devoured<WH398> him: and we shall see<WH7200> what<WH4100> will become<WH1961> of his dreams.<WH2472>
And Reuben<WH7205> heard<WH8085> it, and he delivered<WH5337> him out of their hands;<WH4480> <WH3027> and said,<WH559> Let us not<WH3808> kill<WH5221> him.

And Reuben<WH7205> said<WH559> unto<WH413> them, Shed<WH8210> no<WH408> blood,<WH1818> but cast<WH7993> him into<WH413> this<WH2088> pit<WH953> that<WH834> is in the wilderness,<WH4057> and lay<WH7971> no<WH408> hand<WH3027> upon him; that<WH4616> he might rid<WH5337> him out of their hands,<WH4480> <WH3027> to deliver<WH7725> him to<WH413> his father<WH1> again.

And it came to pass,<WH1961> when<WH834> Joseph<WH3130> was come<WH935> unto<WH413> his brethren,<WH251> that they stripped<WH6584> <WH853> Joseph<WH3130> out of<WH853> his coat,<WH3801> his<WH853> coat<WH3801> of many colors<WH6446> that<WH834> was on<WH5921> him;
And they took<WH3947> him, and cast<WH7993> him into a pit:<WH953> and the pit<WH953> was empty,<WH7386> there was no<WH369> water<WH4325> in it.

And they sat down<WH3427> to eat<WH398> bread:<WH3899> and they lifted up<WH5375> their eyes<WH5869> and looked,<WH7200> and, behold,<WH2009> a company<WH736> of Ishmaelites<WH3459> came<WH935> from Gilead<WH4480> <WH1568> with their camels<WH1581> bearing<WH5375> spicery<WH5219> and balm<WH6875> and myrrh,<WH3910> going<WH1980> to carry it down<WH3381> to Egypt.<WH4714>
And Judah<WH3063> said<WH559> unto<WH413> his brethren,<WH251> What<WH4100> profit<WH1215> is it if<WH3588> we slay<WH2026> <WH853> our brother,<WH251> and conceal<WH3680> <WH853> his blood?<WH1818>

Come, <WH1980> and let us sell<WH4376> him to the Ishmaelites,<WH3459> and let not<WH408> our hand<WH3027> be<WH1961> upon him; for<WH3588> he<WH1931> is our brother<WH251> and our flesh.<WH1320> And his brethren<WH251> were content.<WH8085>

Then there passed by<WH5674> Midianites<WH376> <WH4084> merchantmen;<WH5503> and they drew<WH4900> and lifted up<WH5927> <WH853> Joseph<WH3130> out of<WH4480> the pit,<WH953> and sold<WH4376> <WH853> Joseph<WH3130> to the Ishmaelites<WH3459> for twenty<WH6242> pieces of silver:<WH3701> and they brought<WH935> <WH853> Joseph<WH3130> into Egypt.<WH4714>
And Reuben<WH7205> returned<WH7725> unto<WH413> the pit;<WH953> and, behold,<WH2009> Joseph<WH3130> was not<WH369> in the pit;<WH953> and he rent<WH7167> <WH853> his clothes.<WH899>
And he returned<WH7725> unto<WH413> his brethren,<WH251> and said,<WH559> The child<WH3206> is not;<WH369> and I,<WH589> whither<WH575> shall I<WH589> go?<WH935>
And they took<WH3947> <WH853> Joseph's<WH3130> coat,<WH3801> and killed<WH7819> a kid<WH8163> of the goats,<WH5795> and dipped<WH2881> <WH853> the coat<WH3801> in the blood;<WH1818>

And they sent<WH7971> <WH853> the coat<WH3801> of many colors,<WH6446> and they brought<WH935> it to<WH413> their father;<WH1> and said,<WH559> This<WH2063> have we found:<WH4672> know<WH5234> now<WH4994> whether it<WH1931> be thy son's<WH1121> coat<WH3801> or<WH518> no.<WH3808>
And he knew<WH5234> it, and said,<WH559> It is my son's<WH1121> coat;<WH3801> an evil<WH7451> beast<WH2416> hath devoured<WH398> him; Joseph<WH3130> is without doubt rent in pieces.<WH2963> <WH2963>
And Jacob<WH3290> rent<WH7167> his clothes,<WH8071> and put<WH7760> sackcloth<WH8242> upon his loins,<WH4975> and mourned<WH56> for<WH5921> his son<WH1121> many<WH7227> days.<WH3117>

And all<WH3605> his sons<WH1121> and all<WH3605> his daughters<WH1323> rose up<WH6965> to comfort<WH5162> him; but he refused<WH3985> to be comforted;<WH5162> and he said,<WH559> For<WH3588> I will go down<WH3381> into the grave<WH7585> unto<WH413> my son<WH1121> mourning.<WH57> Thus his father<WH1> wept<WH1058> for him.
And the Midianites<WH4092> sold<WH4376> him into<WH413> Egypt<WH4714> unto Potiphar,<WH6318> an officer<WH5631> of Pharaoh's,<WH6547> and captain<WH8269> of the guard.<WH2876>
